description: In less than 20 minutes, you can make crunchy candied nuts using beer. These nuts keep very well and are the perfect snack or homemade gift.
name: Candied Beer Nuts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Place sugar, ale, chilli and syrup in a small saucepan over medium heat and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until sugar has dissolved. Bring to the boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes or until thick and syrupy.

Place pecans, walnuts, cinnamon and sesame seeds in a large frying pan over high heat. Pour over sugar mixture, stirring well to coat. Cook nuts for 5 minutes, stirring frequently, to evenly toast. Transfer to tray and allow to cool completely. Store in an airtight container or glass jar for up to 2 weeks.
